thread.section_title: DiscountASP.NET Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DiscountASP.NET | discountasp.net
thread.title: Iftekhar Ahmed Amit
thread.title_full: DiscountASP.NET reviewed by Iftekhar Ahmed Amit

author: Iftekhar Ahmed Amit
title: Iftekhar Ahmed Amit
text:
Since June 2008, I've using Windows Web Hosting of DiscountASP. It's really a long period of time, almost 9 years using their services.
They've a great support team who gives the required support whenever I needed. Solved any issues within a short period of time.
I'll be using their Windows Web Hosting Service continuously in the future as they always evolving with the Latest/Current Releases of all available Products & Services.
